attributes.action: Stop Tracy Emin becoming a Professor
attributes.additional_details: The Government should prevent ludicrous and talentless poseurs (such as Tracy Emin) being granted positions in eminent establishments such as the Royal Academy of Art where they can influence the artistic youthful talent of our nation.  She is a national disgrace to real talent, and the Government should stop this degeneration of our National Artistic heritage as soon as possible by eliciting public opinion on each and every appointment of extraordinary Professorships in such cases.
